org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler

Interface ExtensibleHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHookableCmdHandler, AuthCmdHandler, CapaCmdHandler, CommandDispatcher, DataCmdHandler, DataLineMessageHookHandler, DataLineMessageHookHandler, EhloCmdHandler, HeloCmdHandler, IMAPCommandDispatcher, LhloCmdHandler, MailCmdHandler, QuitCmdHandler, RcptCmdHandler, UnknownCmdHandler

    public interface ExtensibleHandler
    Handlers implement this interface to be notified of available extensions of the given type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Class<?>> getMarkerInterfaces()
      Return a List of interfaces of plugins that will extend this.
      void wireExtensions(Class<?> interfaceName, List<?> extension)
      Method called during initialization after all the handlers have been declared in the ProtocolHandlerChain.

    • Method Detail

      • getMarkerInterfaces

        List<Class<?>> getMarkerInterfaces()
        Return a List of interfaces of plugins that will extend this.

      • wireExtensions

        void wireExtensions(Class<?> interfaceName,
                  List<?> extension)
                    throws WiringException
        Method called during initialization after all the handlers have been declared in the ProtocolHandlerChain.
        Parameters:
        interfaceName -
        extension - a list of objects implementing the marker interface
        Throws:
        WiringException
